name: MiniGolf
description: Take a swing at this amazing mini-golf game! Enjoy the realistic gameplay with more than 50 fields to play. Your time on these 3-D greens will amaze you as you play through phenomenal obstacles and unique locations, like a castle, a circus, a factory, and more. Can you come in under par?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/ME/Vista/7/8/10 Processor: 1.0GHz CPU Memory: 128 MB RAM Graphics: 128MB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows ME/Vista/7/8/10 Processor: 1.2GHz CPU Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: 256MB Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
